feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12#fixed-in-2024121

What's Changed

  • website/docs: add new section about impersonation (cherry-pick #12328) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12424
  • website/docs: add content about bindings (cherry-pick #11787) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12428
  • internal: fix URL generation for websocket connection (cherry-pick #12439) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12440

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.0...version/2024.12.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12#fixed-in-2024122

What's Changed

  • internal: fix missing trailing slash in outpost websocket (cherry-pick #12470) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12471
  • sources/kerberos: authenticate with the user's username instead of the first username in authentik (cherry-pick #12497) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12579
  • rbac: permissions endpoint: allow authenticated users (cherry-pick #12608) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12610
  • core: fix error when creating new user with default path (cherry-pick #12609) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12612
  • providers/saml: fix invalid SAML Response when assertion and response are signed (cherry-pick #12611) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12613

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.1...version/2024.12.2

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.3
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12#fixed-in-2024123

What's Changed

  • enterprise/rac: Improve client connection status & bugfixes (cherry-pick #12684) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12727
  • ci: release: fix AWS cfn template permissions (cherry-pick #12576) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12739
  • stages/redirect: fix query parameter when redirecting to flow (cherry-pick #12750) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12752
  • lifecycle: fix cryptography's OpenSSL path (cherry-pick #12753) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12759
  • ci: fix missing build args for dev and release (cherry-pick #12760) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12761
  • sources: allow uuid or slug to be used for retrieving a source (2024.12 fix) by @BeryJu in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12772
  • core: fix application entitlements not createable with blueprints (cherry-pick #12673) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12784
  • lifecycle: update python to 3.12.8 (cherry-pick #12783) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12786
  • core: fix permissions for admin device listing (cherry-pick #12787) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12791
  • flows: clear flow state before redirecting to final URL (cherry-pick #12788) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12801
  • rbac: exclude permissions for internal models (cherry-pick #12803) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12807
  • lifecycle: better pre release test (cherry-pick #12806) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12808
  • ci: fix test_docker.sh failing due to missing .env (cherry-pick #12873) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12874
  • ci: fix test_docker.sh failing due to empty .env (cherry-pick #12876) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12877
  • ci: fix test_docker.sh (cherry-pick #12878) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12879
  • ci: fix test_docker.sh (cherry-pick #12880) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12881

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.2...version/2024.12.3

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.2.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.2

What's Changed

  • web/flow: fix translate extract (cherry-pick #13208) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13210

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.2.0-rc3...version/2025.2.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.2.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.2#fixed-in-202521

What's Changed

  • website/docs: remove Enterprise badge from RAC docs (cherry-pick #13069) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13216
  • website/docs: add new SSF provider docs (cherry-pick #13102) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13215
  • website/docs: add info about new perms for super-user in groups (cherry-pick #13188) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13217
  • website/docs: remove mention of wizard (cherry-pick #13126) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13219
  • website/docs: add paragraph about impossible travel (cherry-pick #13125) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13220
  • stages/authenticator_email: Email Authenticator Stage Documentation (cherry-pick #12853) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13218
  • website/docs: fix missing breaking entry for 2025.2 release notes (cherry-pick #13223) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13224
  • core: add pre-hydrated relative URL (cherry-pick #13243) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13246
  • stages/email: Fix email stage serialization (cherry-pick #13256) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13273
  • stages/authenticator_email: fix session cleanup test b (cherry-pick #13264) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.2.0...version/2025.2.1
